search_information.query_displayed: Student Discipline and High School Performance. Myers, David E. And Others Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Student discipline and high school performance
organic_results.snippet: This paper examines the relationship between student misbehavior and academic performance and the effects of family structure and mother's employment on misbehavior and performance. Using panel data on high school sophomores from the High School and Beyond (HSB) survey, we estimate a number of linear panel models. The findings indicate that sophomores with low grades misbehave more as seniors than those with high grades. Academic achievement in the sophomore year has little effect on changes in misbehavior …

publication_info.summary: DE Myers, AM Milne, K Baker, A Ginsburg - Sociology of Education, 1987 - JSTOR
